verses.name: 2 Corinthians 1:21
verses.text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ, and hath anointed us, is God;

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 1:22
verses.text: Who hath also sealed us, and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 1:23
verses.text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul, that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 1:24
verses.text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith, but are helpers of your joy: for by faith ye stand.
